Book direct with hotel and save literallly hundreds of pounds as opposed to booking via tour operator.

reviews.title: Good value in boring location

reviews.text: Selfish clientele who put towels on the dunbeds at 11.45pm, yes that's right 11.45pm.
reviews.title: DONT BOTHER

reviews.text: A fabulous holiday that all the family loved. We stayed with 4 children aged 9, 13, 16 and 18 - they all loved it and want to return next year. The hotel offers a range of accommodation located in 2 areas either side of a very quiet road - we preferred the "superior" rooms on the "sea" side of the road (excellent accommodation, clean and super large walk-in shower). Others may prefer the main part of the hotel where there is more action : activities for children, pool games and evening stage entertainment.
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday - great food, service, accommodation and entertainment

reviews.text: Food was fantastic - we haven't been "all inclusive" before- but were delighted and would definitely recommend this option. Range of foods was excellent - very varied - we particularly enjoyed the "Sunday night sea-food special" and wonderful lamb chops. The fresh fruit was some of the best we have had, and we also enjoyed the wonderful freshly made pizzas in the downstairs pool restaurant. My daughter also delighted with the chocolate ice-cream and children's options - chips, chicken nuggets, burgers, slush drinks etc. The range of inclusive alcoholic/ non-alcoholic drinks was excellent too - wine very drinkable and real coke, fanta etc.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel - shame about sunbed policy!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A word of praise for the entertainment team - Maria, Florin, Tim and Georgia. They were amazing and definitely made our stay extra special. They were extremely talented and worked incredibly hard. They were fantastic with all ages from toddler to adult and we really hope that they will be there next year. Restaurant and bar service also very efficient- especially Simon and Toni.
reviews.title: Nice location. Nice Room. Awful Sunbeds.
Fantastic
reviews.text: We all really loved the pretty bay and beach that the hotel is situated on. My children went swimming and snorkelling every day - very safe little bay with quite a few fish - so make sure you take snorkel and flippers. Would recommend Cala Gran beach too if you enjoy snorkelling - amazing - like swimming in an aquarium.

We visited the natural park and beach at Cala Mondrago - a really beautiful beach just 20 mins away - take the open top local bus from just outside the hotel -great value and fun! If you do any trips make sure you see the reception the day before and order a free picnic to take with you - super! Towels also available to hire from reception - 10 Euros per towel but refunded at end of stay.
reviews.title: Will not return!

reviews.text: We stayed with our 2 children, 5&2 at the Ferrera Blanca for 2 Weeks from 6th June 2010. First impression good but then we were allocated a room directly behind the stage. We asked to be moved due to having young children, the following morning we were allocated a new room in a block at our request. Much better. Plenty pools, all rooms were close to a pool. All inclusive great for kids soft drinks and ice cream, help yourself or staff always on hand to assist. Can't fault the food, loved the fresh seafood. Always plenty of choice in restaurant and staff there pleasant and happy to help. But the best thing about this holiday for us was the entertainment team, our 5 year old daughter would have stayed with them if she could! Maria and her team were just brilliant. Maria, Ani, Florin, Alex, Radu just made it a perfect holiday for our children. They were on hand day and night to entertain the children. They were also happy for us to come along to the clubs with our 2 year old daughter. Mini disco was great, our kids loved dressing as clowns and dancing on stage!Coco the Sea-horse mascot was a hit from day one! Some very good professional shows after and equally entertaining shows from the entertainment team Always 100% effort. Lovely friendly bar staff, always happy to help. Overall a great holiday, would definately return.
reviews.title: Great holiday-great for kids!

reviews.text: Just returned from 10 night all inclusive holiday. I can honestly say it was one of the best holidays we've had. The staff and the animation team were fantastic and were always friendly and professional. Was a little disturbed by the 'sketch show' but otherwise the entertainment was good fun. Loved doing the club dance each night! The atmosphere in the hotel was the best we've experienced and everyone seemed to be having a great time. The only criticism (and it won't stop us returning next year) is that there wasn't a lot of choice for vegetarians for lunch and dinner.
reviews.title: Fantastic family holiday

reviews.text: Went to Ferrera Blance with partner, two kids, grand parents and two teenagers. This hotel was everything you could expect for a 4 star establishment. Everywhere was clean, the food was of a high standard (although could become a little repetative). The entertainment crew were exceptional. Sandy beach was 5 min walk - the cove was beautiful with crystal clear water. Sunbeds were a bit pricey - 12 euros for 2 beds and an umbrella. No complaints from the kids with free ice creams whenever and slush on tap. Self service beer and champagne included.
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday - excellent value!

reviews.text: Room was well equiped, bathroom very modern and clean.
reviews.title: Really Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Three generations of a family on this holiday and no complaints from anyone. Would highly recommend.
reviews.title: Best Holiday Ever - Jobe Family (Newcastle)

reviews.text: I booked an All Inclusive deal through lowcostholidays.com and I can say I was not dissapointed. I travelled with my husband and 4 year old daughter for a 10 night break.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, fantastic staff - great time had by all

reviews.text: The hotel was clean, the staff were friendly and VERY helpful (even charging my Ipod on the reception because I forogt to pack mine) and the animation team were excellent, working long hours and giving 110% all the time. My daughter had a ball at the mini disco each evening, even volunteering to dress up as a clown with members of the team.
reviews.title: Great location but don't book with First Choice

reviews.text: The rooms were very contemporary, spotlessly clean and the walk in shower was excellent. The rooms were cleaned on a daily basis with fresh towels each day.
reviews.title: Excellent clean and modern hotel great for families

reviews.text: The food was good quality with a wide variety and something for everyone. We had every intention of eating out at the Marina on a few occassions but because the food was so good we only did this once.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: A few reveiws have mentioned about the sunbeds, I never once got up at 6.00am to get a bed. We used to take the towels down to breakfast with us and put them out at around 8.00am (We went to the small pool and the pool near the restaurant) and there was still ample amounts of beds left. However, round the main pool the 'get your towels down' situation was quite different. When we got picked up on the morning of our departure date at 7.30am there was quite a few towels down already, but I don't think this is a fault of the hotel, more of it's clients.
reviews.title: Lovely all inclusive, could not fault a single thing. Staff friendly & helpful.

aka: Aparthotel Ferrera Blanca Hotel Cala d`Or
description: One of the most exceptional areas of the Mediterranean, the East coast of Majorca, is known for its fantastic white sandy beaches with crystalline water and beautiful landscapes. This aparthotel in Cala d'Or, for its outstanding hospitality, delicious gastronomy and tastefully refurbished rooms.
